mapper.insert: insert into userfans(user_id, fan_id, fan_follow) value (#{ID}, #{user_ID}, #{fanFoll})

insert into user(user_ID, user_name, user_email, user_password, user_sex, user_age, user_avatar) value (#{user_ID}, #{user_Name}, #{user_Email}, #{user_Password}, #{user_Sex}, #{user_Age}, #{user_Avatar})
mapper.update: update user set user_name=#{user.user_Name}, user_birthday=#{user.user_Birthday}, user_sex=#{user.user_Sex}, user_introduction=#{user.user_Introduction}, user_avatar=#{user.user_Avatar} where user_ID = #{user_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT fan_id, user_name as fan_name, user_avatar as fan_avatar, user_introduction as fan_introduction, fan_follow FROM userfans, user WHERE userfans.user_id = #{user_ID} AND userfans.fan_id = user.user_ID

SELECT SUM(followSum) as followSum, SUM(fanSum) as fanSum FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) followSum, 0 fanSum FROM userfollow where userfollow.user_id = #{user_ID} UNION ALL SELECT 0 followSum, COUNT(*) fanSum FROM userfollow where userfollow.follow_id = #{user_ID}) t;
